Package index

Microdata Helpers

For ACS, CPS ASEC, and basic monthly CPS microdata

make_age_group_var()
Make an age group variable
make_race_eth_var()
Make a race/ethnicity variable
wt_sum() wt_mean() wt_median() wt_quantile()
Compute basic weighted statistics

CBPP Shared Drives

sp_data_path() od_path() sp_path()
Create a path to SharePoint and OneDrive directories
sp_acs() sp_cps_asec() sp_cps_basic()
Create paths to files in a synced datasets library

Stata Synergy

do_stata()
Run a Stata .do file in batch mode
stata_exe()
Install the path to your Stata executable in your .Renviron file
zap_stata()
Remove all Stata dataset attributes from a data frame

State Codes

state_fips
State FIPS codes
fct_statefips()
Convert a state FIPS code to a labeled factor

Built in Datasets

cpi_u_rs
CPI-U-RS
state_fips
State FIPS codes
